title: Support Providers
description: Rocky Linux is commercially supported by CIQ, our founding partner and sponsor, as well as other non-affiliated companies.

providers.name: CIQ
providers.description: We believe in helping people to do great things. This is why CIQ is a founding sponsor of the RESF. We provide commercial support and services for Rocky Linux to customers in research, academia, government, enterprise, partners, and everyone in between.

get-onboard: Interested in getting listed on this page? Send an email to hello@rockylinux.org.
